column2: "Ɔsor ahenman no tse dɛ nyimpa a ɔyɛ asaasewura a opuee anapaatu dɛ ɔrokɔbɔ edwumafo paa akɔ no wenyin ture mu."
"Na ɔnye edwumayɛfo no dzii ano da kor akatua no
column3: ɔmaa wɔkɔr no wenyin ture mu."

column2: "Na opuei bɛyɛ dɛ anapa ndɔnkron no
column3: na okohun binom dɛ wogyinagyina gua do enyihaw mu;"
Hom so hom nkɔ wenyin ture no mu
column4: na dza ɔsɛ no mebɛma hom. Na wɔkɔree."

column2: "Ɔkɔr bio bɛyɛ ewiaber duebien nye ndɔnebiasa no mu kɛyɛɛ dɛmara."
